movies.title: 3096 Days
movies.plot: A young Austrian girl is kidnapped and held in captivity for eight years. Based on the real-life case of Natascha Kampusch.

events.title: Natascha Kampusch escapes from her kidnappers

movies.title: The Baader Meinhof Complex
movies.plot: Der Baader Meinhof Komplex depicts the political turmoil in the period from 1967 to the bloody "Deutschen Herbst" in 1977. The movie approaches the events based on Stefan Aust's standard work on Die Rote Armee Fraktion (RAF). The story centers on the leadership of the self named anti-fascist resistance to state violence: Andreas Baader, Ulrike Meinhof and Gudrun Ensslin.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 20 nominations.

events.title: the Shah of Iran visits West Berlin
Petra Schelm is killed in a shootout with police
the Red Army Faction take over the West German Embassy in Stockholm
Hanns-Martin Schleyer is kidnapped by the Red Army Faction
Hanns-Martin Schleyer is murdered by the Red Army Faction

movies.title: Downfall
movies.plot: In April of 1945, Germany stands at the brink of defeat with the Russian Army closing in from the east and the Allied Expeditionary Force attacking from the west. In Berlin, capital of the Third Reich, Adolf Hitler proclaims that Germany will still achieve victory and orders his generals and advisers to fight to the last man. When the end finally does come, and Hitler lies dead by his own hand, what is left of his military must find a way to end the killing that is the Battle of Berlin, and lay down their arms in surrender.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 22 wins & 32 nominations.

movies.title: Pompeii
movies.plot: In 79 A.D., Milo, a slave turned gladiator, finds himself in a race against time to save his true love Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant who has been unwillingly betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts in a torrent of blazing lava, Milo must fight his way out of the arena in order to save his beloved as the once magnificent Pompeii crumbles around him.
